author: Roger Vilalta
description: Made to the easy-to-remember 3:2:1 Daiquiri "countdown" formula (3 parts rum, 2 parts lime & 1 part sugar), this balanced and limey daiquiri suits a more characterful light rum.
name: Daiquiri No.1 Natural (Countdown 3:2:1 formula)
